content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the location of this apartment is truly remarkable. Now, as for the rental price, I believe that given its prime location and the amenities nearby, a price of €1,000 per month would be more than fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its location, but I'm looking for a place that fits within my budget. Could we perhaps discuss a lower price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Mr. Abbasi. I understand that everyone has a budget. How about €900 per month? That's a good amount lower than my initial offer, but still quite reasonable considering the apartment's value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €900 is more in line with what I had in mind. Could we perhaps negotiate a bit further? Perhaps a smaller deposit or some additional amenities?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm not comfortable lowering the deposit amount, as it is already quite reasonable. However, considering your interest in the apartment, I'm willing to offer a price of €850 per month. That's as low as I can go, considering the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: €850 is an attractive price. I believe we're getting closer to an agreement. Would you be willing to include any additional services or benefits to sweeten the deal?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm afraid I cannot offer any additional services or benefits at this price. However, considering the apartment's location and amenities, I believe €850 per month is an excellent price for you. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe I have already provided a fair offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time and effort, Mr. Schmidt. I believe €850 is a fair price as well. I agree to the price of €850 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
